name: ISLAND Token
description: Nifty Island is an open gaming platform powered by user-generated content, where NFT, memecoin, and web3 communities can play, create, and earn rewards. Everyone is given a free island to build their dream world, showcase their digital collectibles, and create fun games and experiences for others to explore. With over 70,000 user-generated islands built, 75,000 user-generated assets created, and 1.3 million user-generated games played, Nifty Island is one of the most active creator economies in web3 gaming.
